patthana16.2:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.2:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana16.2:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:3.1_1: Abyākataṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:3.1_2: Abyākataṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.2:5.1_0: Kusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:5.1_1: Kusalo sahetuko dhammo naakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:5.1_2: Kusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa ca naakusalassa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana16.2:6.1_0: Akusalo sahetuko dhammo naakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:6.1_1: Akusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:6.1_2: Akusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa ca naakusalassa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana16.2:7.1_0: Abyākato sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana16.2:9.1_0: Akusalaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:9.1_1: Akusalaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana16.2:11.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
